medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent hiccups, cognitive dysfunction, and imbalance.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Hiccups persisted for 1 week; nausea and vomiting for 3 days. Family noted right-hand tremor and gait imbalance for the last 3 months. Over the past 6 months, coworkers observed that he was completing work more slowly and forgetting how to perform simple tasks, along with several instances of arriving at the wrong hours for work.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of HIV diagnosed 10 years ago, with good adherence to an antiretroviral regimen consisting of tenofovir, emtricitabine, and atazanavir boosted by ritonavir.
medical_history.social_history: Denies illicit or IV drug use, new sexual partners, recent travel, ill contacts, or toxic exposures.
